code: import React from'react';function Side(props){var finished;function setVal(){if(props.sd.includes("+")){return"+ "+props.sd[1];}else if(props.sd.includes("Sp")){return"";}else{return props.sd[0];}}function setClass(){if(props.sd.includes("+")){return true;}else{return false;}}if(props.sd.includes("RD")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("Sh")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("MD")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("ID")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("Dc")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("Dr")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("F")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else if(props.sd.includes("Sp")){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else if(props.sd.includes("R")){if(setClass()){finished=""+setVal()+" ";}else{finished=""+setVal()+" ";}}else{finished="-";}if(!isNaN(props.sd[props.sd.length-1])&&props.sd[props.sd.length-1]!=="-"){finished=finished+" "+props.sd[props.sd.length-1]+" ";}return React.createElement("div",{className:"side",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:finished}});}export default Side;
